FAQ / Alpha Trion Protocols / Wave 3 / Characters /
View On Teletraan1.net

Ransack - Hungry For Battle

  1. Post WotC: Alpha Trion Protocols
    Does Ransack’s first Alt ability count himself?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols Wave 3 FAQ]
    No, he says *other* Insecticon on your starting team. If your team was 4 Insecticons, including him, your deck could have up to 3 extra stars in it.
  2. Post WotC: Alpha Trion Protocols
    Is Ransack’s flip-to-Alt ability optional; do I have to do it if I have an Upgrade I could scrap?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols Wave 3 FAQ]
    The ability is mandatory, if you have an Upgrade--so be careful about flipping this guy!
  3. Post WotC: Alpha Trion Protocols
    Does Raider Brunt or Acid Storm stop Ransack’s Bot mode flipping of extra cards in battle?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols Wave 3 FAQ]
    No, those characters care about Bold; this mechanic is similar to Bold, but is not the named mechanic unless keyworded as such.
